title: Wirtshaus Richel's
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Beer/Wine, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The German Vegetarian Society has begun a programme for restaurants to have one day of the week vegetarian. Richel's Wirtshaus has started participating on Fridays, so every Friday, there is a selection of 8-10 vegetarian entr√©es. Most of these options are vegan. There are also a selection veg appetizers and desserts. On the other days, you will find only 2 vegan options on the menu.
